body:
All submissions for this problem are available.

If Give an integer N . Write a program to obtain the sum of the first and last digit of this number.

Input

The first line contains an integer T, total number of test cases. Then follow T lines, each line contains an integer N.

Output

Display the sum of first and last digit of N.

Constraints

  • 1 ≤ T ≤ 1000
  • 1 ≤ N ≤ 1000000

Example

Input
3 
1234
124894
242323

Output
5
5
5
languages_supported: ADA, ASM, BASH, BF, C, C99 strict, CAML, CLOJ, CLPS, CPP 4.3.2, CPP 4.9.2, CPP14, CS2, D, ERL, FORT, FS, GO, HASK, ICK, ICON, JAVA, JS, LISP clisp, LISP sbcl, LUA, NEM, NICE, NODEJS, PAS fpc, PAS gpc, PERL, PERL6, PHP, PIKE, PRLG, PYPY, PYTH, PYTH 3.4, RUBY, SCALA, SCM chicken, SCM guile, SCM qobi, ST, TCL, TEXT, WSPC
